title: Designing an Online English Literature Education Program: Integrating the ADDIE Model and UDL

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English Education Experience and Basic Literary Appreciation Skills
context.additional_context: For learners in managerial/leadership roles, providing English literature education using VR-based simulation tools in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design an online English literature education module using the five phases of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation).
Learners can establish literature content delivery strategies that apply UDL principles (Engagement, Representation, Action & Expression).
Learners can implement three or more digital literary appreciation activities in a VR-based simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
